## Vector4.Center() method

Returns a new Vector4 located at the center between the vectors "value1" and "value2".

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static Center(value1: ReadOnlyVector4, value2: ReadOnlyVector4): Vector4;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value1 | <code>ReadOnlyVector4</code> | value to calulate the center between |
|  value2 | <code>ReadOnlyVector4</code> | value to calulate the center between |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Vector4`

the center between the two vectors
